Adyen Payments

Open console. Payments are stored in a window object (adyenPayments).

Sample code

let selectedPayment = adyenPayments[0];
console.log(selectedPayment.schema);
selectedPayment.setValue( { 'cardDetails.cvc' : 'ABCD'} );
console.log(selectedPayment.getValue());
console.log(selectedPayment.schema);
